column1: Some products generate much higher sales than others.
This shows customers prefer these products.
The business should focus more on stocking and promoting these top products.
Sales change from month to month.
Certain months show higher sales than others.
The business can plan offers or promotions during low-sales months.
A few regions contribute most of the total profit.
This means those regions perform better financially.
The business should strengthen operations in high-profit regions.
Some categories bring more profit than others.
More investment should be made in profitable categories.
Focusing on top products, strong regions, and high-profit categories can improve growth.
Using data helps make better business decisions.
